pull.title: Enforce LOW_S rules on all transactions with WITNESS BIP9 parameters
pull.body: This will enforce SCRIPT_VERIFY_LOW_S on all transactions when segwit is activated with BIP9

events.message: Enforce LOW_S rules on all transactions with WITNESS BIP9 parameters
Make test framework produce lowS signatures

events.body:
It is proposed to enforce NULLDUMMY at the same time: https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/pull/435

Codes will be updated.
